snippet.title: Starfleet Academy: Intro
snippet.description:
Star Trek:  Starfleet Academy is the PC-equivalent of the SNES game.  The missions aren't 100% identical, but there are some similarities.

Getting this working correctly was a pain in the butt.  It works on Windows XP, but the in-mission audio skips around.  It's even worse on a virtual machine of Windows 98.

Fortunately, a special SVN build of DOSBox can handle Windows 95 and the game fairly well.
